Subject: Upgrading the Netwrix Enterprise Auditor from 11.6.0.117 to 12.0.0.1061
Description:
Hello,
I would like to upgrade the Netwrix Enterprise Auditor to the latest version. 
The Netwrix Activity Monitor is a pair with this tool. I would like to upgrade NAM to the latest version as well. 

Thank you,
Bao Luu.
What_We_Know__c:
1) Upgraded NEA from 11.6.0.117 to 12.0.0.1061 
2) Upgraded AIC from 11.6.0.25 to 12.0.0.48
3) Recovered AIC access - netsh http show sslcert - the SSL cert for AIC was not bound to the port
4) Recovered NEA Published Reports Access - "Netwrix Enterprise Auditor Web Server" was not running with "Log On As" the service account credentials
Solution_Comment__c:
1) Upgraded NEA from 11.6.0.117 to 12.0.0.1061 
2) Upgraded AIC from 11.6.0.25 to 12.0.0.48
3) Recovered AIC access - netsh http show sslcert - the SSL cert for AIC was not bound to the port
4) Recovered NEA Published Reports Access - "Netwrix Enterprise Auditor Web Server" was not running with "Log On As" the service account credentials
